text: I am trying to help a good cause. Would you like to help?
What sort of good cause is It?
It is called Save The Children. Have you heard of it?
I'm not sure. Could you tell me more about it?
Yes they help children and their families, by helping children with safety, health, and education concerns.
In what country?
They help on six continents. They are still trying to get started in North America.
It sounds like a good cause. How could I help?
Well any donation can help. We get people to think how our change that can buy a cup of coffee here could help a family eat for a day or more somewhere else.
I would like to donate.
You can donate from $0 to $2, your payment?
I'm not sure yet. Would 50 cents be able to help a family really?
That would really help. Do you know what that would buy for a family?
I do not. It doesn't sound like much.
For a family in Kenya it will buy a meal big enough for a family of eight of rice, beans, bread, and clean water for two meals.
Really? Wow. That is a lot!
So you would like to donate 50 cents?
I'm on a tight budget but i an spare 50 cents. So yes. How do I donate?
I will provide you a link to the Save The Children website. You can donate the 50 cents there, alright?
Ok. Thank you for the link.
